# Concepts

The epochs module defines on-chain timers that execute at fixed time intervals. Other Qom One modules can then register logic to be executed at the timer ticks. We refer to the period in between two timer ticks as an "epoch".

Every timer has a unique identifier, and every epoch will have a start time and an end time, where end time = start time + timer interval.
